message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,000. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still think $10,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that.
